001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions;
002
003import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.client.NetworkManager;
004import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletEvents.PingOneWalletConstants;
005
006import java.io.Serializable;
007import java.util.Objects;
008
009public class PingOneRegion implements Serializable {
010
011    //North America
012    public static final PingOneRegion NA = new PingOneRegion(PingOneWalletConstants.DEFAULT_BASE_URL_NORTH_AMERICA);
013    //Europe
014    public static final PingOneRegion EU = new PingOneRegion(PingOneWalletConstants.DEFAULT_BASE_URL_EUROPE);
015    //Asia-Pacific
016    public static final PingOneRegion APAC = new PingOneRegion(PingOneWalletConstants.DEFAULT_BASE_URL_ASIA);
017    //Asia-Pacific for v1, don't use unless absolutely sure that your application needs to support this domain
018    public static final PingOneRegion APAC_2 = new PingOneRegion(PingOneWalletConstants.DEFAULT_BASE_URL_ASIA_2);
019    //Canada
020    public static final PingOneRegion CA = new PingOneRegion(PingOneWalletConstants.DEFAULT_BASE_URL_CA);
021
022    private final String baseUrl;
023
024    public PingOneRegion(String baseUrl) {
025        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
026    }
027
028    public String getBaseUrl() {
029        return baseUrl;
030    }
031
032    public static PingOneRegion initForUrl(String requestUrl)  {
033        String host = NetworkManager.extractBaseUrl(requestUrl);
034
035        PingOneRegion region = getRegionForHost(host);
036        if(region != null){
037            return region;
038        }
039
040        String url = String.format("https://%s/v1/", host);
041        return new PingOneRegion(url);
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public boolean equals(Object o) {
046        if (this == o) return true;
047        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
048        PingOneRegion that = (PingOneRegion) o;
049        return Objects.equals(baseUrl, that.baseUrl);
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public int hashCode() {
054        return Objects.hash(baseUrl);
055    }
056
057    public static PingOneRegion getRegionForHost(String host) {
058        if (host.endsWith("api.pingone.com.au")) {
059            return APAC_2;
060        } else if (host.endsWith("api.pingone.com")) {
061            return NA;
062        } else if (host.endsWith("api.pingone.eu")) {
063            return EU;
064        } else if (host.endsWith("api.pingone.asia")) {
065            return APAC;
066        } else if (host.endsWith("api.pingone.ca")) {
067            return CA;
068        } else {
069            return null;
070        }
071    }
072
073}
074
